hymn.title: You can train a dog to shake hands for fun

layout.singingstanza: You can train a dog to shake hands for fun; But the paw is for walk -- ing when the trick is done. A paw is de -- signed to run and stand. The dog has a paw, and the man has a hand.

lyrics.stanza: You can train a dog to shake hands for fun; But the paw is for walking when the trick is done. A paw is designed to run and stand. The dog has a paw, and the man has a hand.
